thread.title: Bunk beds are genius!
thread.title_full: Bunk beds are genius! - Review of Arlo NoMad, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 123Reviewer2016
title: Bunk beds are genius!
text: This is a superbly located gem of a hotel a short stroll to the subway, Macys, Empire State Building and walkable to Times Square and Rockefeller Centre. The quirky decor, cafe in the lobby, cosy bar/restaurant and chirpy, helpful staff make this a fabulous find. The rooms are small but sufficient and the bunk beds (each a large single) are ideal for friends sharing.
